import { Meta, Story, Preview } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import ChartFrame from '../chart-frame';

<Meta title="Components/Chartframes/Print" component={ChartFrame} />

# Print frames

Frames styled for FT print charts. Widths and heights are measured in millimetres.

### Print (one-column)

<Preview>
  <Story name="One-column">
    <ChartFrame type="print" width={53.71} height={69.85} />
  </Story>
</Preview>

### Print (two-column)

<Preview>
  <Story name="Two-column">
    <ChartFrame type="print" width={112.25} height={69.85} />
  </Story>
</Preview>

### Print (three-column)

<Preview>
  <Story name="Three-column">
    <ChartFrame type="print" width={170.8} height={69.85} />
  </Story>
</Preview>

### Print (four-column)

<Preview>
  <Story name="Four-column">
    <ChartFrame type="print" width={229.34} height={69.85} />
  </Story>
</Preview>

<Preview>
  <Story name="Five-column">
    <ChartFrame type="print" width={287.88} height={69.85} />
  </Story>
</Preview>

<Preview>
  <Story name="Six-column">
